segments.text: What do you base our grades on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All of your coursework is important , including everything from attendance and homework to all of your test results for the semester .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does the final count the most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All of it is important ; please just do your best at all times .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you total our scores ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The final and mid-term are twenty percent each ; homework , attendance , and quizzes are the rest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What if we are out sick ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make sure you contact me as I only allow one unexcused absence .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How can we know if we are doing OK during the year ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your grade will not be a surprise ; you will know what you need to work on .
segments.speaker: S2
